He then changes his mind about leaving, wanting to make Lee suffer.

title: Episode #2.134
description: Ann receives her father's inheritance. Lee wants a job from Leslie, but he doesn't want to help him and Lee threatens not to leave it with that. Steven asks Allison for permission to use the information Chris told her in confidence. He next questions Chris, but he pretends he doesn't remember anything and tells him Allison misinterpreted what he said. After his conversation with Lee, Leslie is misinformed with Rodney's so-called relationship with Betty and confronts him with it. Hannah goes to Steven to tell him not to treat Betty so hard, but he is mad at her and sends her away.

title: Episode #2.135
description: Betty receives a letter from Steven, in which he asks for a divorce. Julie tries to convince her to fight for her marriage. Allison regrets having told Chris' secret, but knows it's for the best. Steven gets into a fight with Chris over him wanting to keep silent about Ann's innocence and Chris claims Allison was lying. Steven makes him tell the truth by threatening to ruin his career future. Eventually, Chris admits Ann didn't push her.

title: Episode #2.136
description: When Ann hears the news about Chris' revealing she's innocent, she announces she finally can have a future. Steven barges into Ada's tavern, demanding a drink, and later tells her Betty has left him. Michael is happy to hear Ann is now officially innocent and they get engaged. Lee offers Chris to move away from Peyton Place with him, but he responds by saying he told Steven that Ann wasn't guilty. Lee is outraged and beats him up. He immediately apologizes, but Chris is full with anger.

title: Episode #2.137
description: Ann finds out her father's real last name was Cord. Betty tells Rodney that Steven is divorcing her. She wonders if it is a punishment, for not having loved Steven when she married him. Meanwhile, Steven questions Elliot about Betty and Rodney, and he responds that he hasn't noticed anything. Later, after having returned home, he receives a visit from Rodney. He tries to explain that there is nothing going on between them, but Steven is too mad to believe him. Realizing he can't solve it if he doesn't tell him the truth, Rodney admits that Ann Howard is his sister and that Brian Colby was his father. However, Steven doesn't believe him and orders Rodney to get out of his life.

title: Episode #2.138
description: When Ann shows him the letter her real name is Cord, Steven finally realizes Rodney was telling the truth. Ann thinks he knew all along and suspects that they sent her away. She can't believe Hannah lied to her face all along and says she won't be able to forgive her. Steven asks her not to go public yet with the information, so he can find out why they were never told the truth. Meanwhile, Chris tells Lee he has got to be stopped and he responds he doesn't trust him any longer. Steven visits Betty to tell her he knows about the secret and they reunite. Julie announces that George has almost recovered and that she and him are going to move somewhere else, for instance California. At the Peyton mansion, Rodney tells Peyton and Hannah that Steven and Ann know everything. Peyton is outraged, but Rodney blames him for ruining a marriage for his own sake.

title: Episode #2.139
description: Ann visits the Peyton mansion and demands an explanation. Hannah tells her she hated them when they were born and wanted Brian out of her life. She admits Brian had an affair with Catherine Peyton, his art student, and was later paid by Martin Peyton to get out of their life. Ann, realizing how bad their parents were, thinks because of that she could've been able to push Chris and thinks Chris lied about telling her she was innocent. Meanwhile, Allison is worried about Chris. Steven tells Betty he doesn't want to have anything to do with Martin and Hannah anymore.

title: Episode #2.140
description: Allison is looking for Chris at the beach and notices Lee riding by with his motor. She is shocked to find Ann's lifeless body on the rocks of the sea. Rodney announces he is moving out of the Peyton mansion. Allison is sad over having seen Michael's devastation after the loss of his fiancée. Chris is found by the police and becomes a suspect for having walked alone near the beach. Mike is determined to find out who killed Ann, even if it's the last thing he will do.

title: Episode #2.141
description: Chris feels betrayed by Allison and is annoyed by the interrogation of Ann's death. Rodney tells Allison she shouldn't let Ann's death stop her from living. Ada fears Mike's aggressive behavior since Ann's death will make him do something foolish. Elliot suspects Ann might have committed suicide.

title: Episode #2.142
description: Mike questions Lee about his whereabouts when Ann dies, but he responds by saying she probably killed herself. When Lee tells him Ann was a lost case, Mike gets mad and hits him. Rod tells Steven that Ann was in a shock after having talked to Hannah, which occurred only two hours before her death. Steven blames Peyton and Hannah and swears to make them pay. Rodney convinces Norman and Rita to find out what Peyton and Hannah are keeping secret. Peyton is outraged to hear Hannah told Ann about Catherine. He thinks Hannah has something to do with Ann's death, because she went out 'for a walk' that afternoon. Hannah assures him she doesn't have anything to do with out and tells him the constant interrogation about their past can finally be over.

title: Episode #2.143
description: Sandy tells Chris that Lee was with her when Ann died, but he doesn't believe her. Peyton confronts Rodney with him having left the Peyton mansion and later questions him about Hannah's whereabouts around the time Ann died. Rodney responds she had been running and looked frightened. Meanwhile, Mike is mad at Allison because she is too tired to tell him about what she has seen. Steven blames Hannah for being incapable to love someone and makes clear he never wants to see her again.

title: Episode #2.144
description: Rodney tells Peyton he wants to move back into his mansion, but expresses his desire of Hannah leaving. Peyton responds it's too late for firing her. Meanwhile, Elliot isn't glad to find out Fowler is investigating Ann's death. Fowler knows Ann has spent time in a mental institution and questions Steven if it's possible she had committed suicide. Allison tells Fowler she saw Lee holding a bottle on the bluff.

title: Episode #2.145
description: Lee's bottle is found and he is soon arrested. Allison tries to convince Chris to tell her what he knows, but he states he doesn't know anything. Lee blames Allison for his arrest and calls Sandy to order her to find out what she told the police. He also makes her tell everyone that he was with her around the time that Ann died. Meanwhile, Steven and Betty return home from Ann's funeral. Steven thinks Hannah is responsible for Ann's death. Hannah assures Peyton she has nothing to do with Ann's death. Sandy is bullying Allison with calling her a tease and blames her for lying to the police to get Lee behind jail.

title: Episode #2.146
description: Chris admits to Allison he was in love with her, until she betrayed him. He blames her for being incapable to love. The trial against Lee starts. Lee pleads not guilty and wants Steven as his lawyer, but he refuses to. Steven later doubts if he is guilty and starts to suspect Ann might have killed herself.

title: Episode #2.147
description: Allison is in a state of shock. Rodney proposes to her, but she refuses, thinking he feels sorry for her. Connie and Elliot worry about her, realizing she went through too much the last years. Leslie visits the Peyton house and surprises Peyton and later Steven with the information Hannah was looking for Ann a few hours before her death. Allison has left home and is missing since. Elliot tries to find her, but he has no luck.

title: Episode #2.148
description: Elliot wants Michael to take some rest. Lee admits to Steven he has pushed his brother off the bluff, but says that he hasn't got anything to do with Ann's death. Steven finally agrees to take on his case. Meanwhile, Mike finds Allison at the bluff and becomes mad at her for being irresponsible. He takes her back home and announces she will have to be hospitalized.

title: Episode #2.149
description: Mike becomes mad when he learns that Steven will serve as Lee's attorney. Lee agrees to do whatever Steven tells him to. Allison secretly leaves the hospital. Betty feels that Steven is only helping Lee to eventually upset Martin Peyton. She and Steven later notice Allison wandering on the street. She is thinking of all the horrible things that have happened the last year. Lee confronts her, saying that Peyton Place is awaiting a lot of dark nights and that she should hide.

title: Episode #2.150
description: The news of Allison's disappearance shocks Peyton Place. Elliot takes it out on the hospital, for nobody having stopped her from leaving. Chris isn't glad that Steven will be Lee's lawyer. Rodney searches all over town for Allison, without any luck. Meanwhile, Lee lies to Steven that he didn't speak to Allison that night. Elliot is outraged when he hears that Lee is out on bail.

title: Episode #2.151
description: Rodney admits that he proposed to Allison only a few hours before her disappearance. He and Norman later start a search for her. Elliot expresses his worries about Allison to Mike. Fowler doesn't believe Lee's side of the story about the Ann Howard death case. He is eventually sent back to jail. Mike confronts him about taking Lee's case, insisting that he killed Ann.

title: Episode #2.152
description: Rodney feels guilty about Allison's disappearance. Martin assures him that Allison will never return to Peyton Place again. Elliot believes that Lee is responsible for Allison leaving town and is frustrated that he can't do anything about it. Chris regrets not having come forward with who was responsible for his blindness before Ann's death. He tries to convince that Lee was responsible for her death, but Sandy doesn't want to listen. He later blames Elliot for Allison having nobody to love her. Meanwhile, Betty tries to comfort Connie. Connie decides to go to New York to look for Allison.

title: Episode #2.153
description: Lee denies having pushed Allison to leave town. Rodney feels that he could've stopped her from leaving. Betty wants to help Connie forget about Allison, but she says she couldn't ever do that. Steven expresses his hatred for Hannah and doesn't respond to Peyton's attempts to intimidate him. He resigns himself as Peyton's lawyer. Chris admits to Rodney that he was in love with Allison. Connie tells Eli that she is going to give her next baby everything that Allison didn't have.

title: Episode #3.1
description: Steven admits to Chris that he is counting on his help on the Ann Howard case. Hannah tries to get rid of every evidence of Brian Colby ever having lived. Chris pushes Sandy to testify against Lee. Connie wants to name her son after Matthew Swain.

title: Episode #3.2
description: Sandy starts to think that Lee might be guilty of the murder on Ann. Elliot has left for New York to look for Allison. Connie has some pregnancy troubles and is brought to the hospital by Betty. Peyton wants Rodney to encourage Betty to convince Steven to withdraw from the case. Norman and Rita have a fight over what to do about his career future. Connie has to go into premature labor.

title: Episode #3.3
description: Elliot returns from his trip to New York to stand by Connie as their son is born. Steven asks Betty to spy for him at the Peyton mansion, convincing her to try and get information which could help him at the defending of Lee. Connie feels that her son Matthew is a replacement for Allison. Steven doesn't allow Lee to go on stand during the trial. Peyton asks Betty to forbid Steven from defending Lee, but she refuses to.

title: Episode #3.4
description: Steven tells Betty that he will go as far as he has to to get the truth out of Peyton and Hannah. Peyton forces Hannah to leave Peyton Place, after telling Steven that she is going to New York. He explains that it is a plan, trying to find out how important Hannah is to him. When she tells him, he immediately suspects Peyton is behind it. Meanwhile, Fowler offers Chris to testify against Lee, but he doesn't accept. Rodney, Norman and Rita visit Connie's baby. Norman offers Rita to get a baby, on condition that he drops out college and work full time.

title: Episode #3.5
description: Fowler questions Michael about Steven's relationship with Ann. Confused, Michael contacts Peyton, demanding information about Ann's death. Peyton's unclear answers make Michael suspect him of the murder. Meanwhile, Steven tries to make clear to Lee how serious the trial is. Rita tells Connie that she is ready to have a child, but that she can't, because Norman is still in college. At the start of the trial, Chris takes a seat at the prosecution's side, much to Lee's rage.

title: Episode #3.6
description: Michael gives a testimony in court. Afterwards, Elliot is upset he didn't attack Lee in it. When Betty finds out Hannah is leaving town, she responds by saying she hopes she never comes back. Judge Chester is unsatisfied with the trial, feeling that both Steven and Fowler are crossing the lines. Steven assures him he has a strategy, for which Chester warns him.

title: Episode #3.7
description: In court, Steven tries to make Mike consider the possibility that Ann killed herself. Mike admits that that was his first thought when he found out that she died. Meanwhile, Rita asks Connie if she can work as Matthew's babysitter. Norman doesn't approve it, thinking it could enlarge her desire of having babies. Hannah returns to Peyton Place at the same moment Fowler is visiting the Peyton mansion. Peyton threatens to call for an attorney when Fowler immediately starts interrogation. After Fowler leaves, Peyton becomes mad at Hannah, but she responds that she doesn't need his permission for her decisions.

title: Episode #3.8
description: Steven wants Sandy to behave as a supporting wife, so it will look like Lee is a good natured man. Chris tells Steven he doesn't believe that Steven thinks that Lee is innocent. Elliot offers Michael to be Matthew's godfather. Steven lies to Fowler that he sympathized for his mother when he found out Ann was his sister. Fowler has plans to manipulate Norman's testimony. Sandy admits to Rodney that she doesn't love Lee anymore. Rodney feels that she is trying to seduce him and pulls her away from him.

title: Episode #3.9
description: Sandy tries to grow closer to Rodney and, although he tries to do the opposite, they end up kissing each other. When Steven and Lee find out that Chris is testifying against Lee, Steven wants to show the judge that Chris' hatred for Lee for blinding him is too big to give an honest testimony. Elliot and Eli discuss the motivation for Allison's leaving and they mention that she left behind the bracelet Elliot gave her. Sandy visits Lee in prison and he becomes outraged when she admits that she and Rodney kissed. Norman and Rita go camping in the woods. At night, they enter an abandoned cabin and they notice a girl sleeping there. Assuming it is Allison, they decide to wake her up.

title: Episode #3.10
description: When Norman and Rita find a girl in the cabin, they try to talk to her, but she is awfully scared and tries to run away. Trying to help her, they refuse to let her go. She starts to struggle and eventually falls unconscious. It is then when Norman and Rita notice Allison's bracelet in her hands. Meanwhile, Sandy turns to Rodney for emotional support, but she feels as if he treats her as dirt. She admits that she told what happened between them to Lee and warns him that he will most likely go after him if he is released from jail. They are later seen driving in the same car, which upsets Steven. At the hospital, Norman asks for Dr. Rossi's help to take care of the girl from the cabin. She refuses to identify herself and when Dr. Rossi tries to take back Allison's bracelet, she unsuccessfully tries to stab him with a pair of scissors.

title: Episode #3.11
description: Nobody is able to calm the unidentified girl, with nurse Choate even calling her vicious. Elliot tries to find out how she got Allison's bracelet, but she is too frightened to speak. Her fright worries Elliot, suspecting that something terrible has happened to Allison. Meanwhile, Steven asks Rodney not to hang out with Sandy anymore, explaining it could influence the trial. Chris gives his testimony in court, saying that he was secretly at the bluff around the time Ann died and that she heard Lee with her, shortly before she fell.

title: Episode #3.12
description: Steven tries to prove that Chris' story as a witness of Ann's death isn't trust-able. Connie receives a prank call from an anonymous man claiming he has seen Allison. At the hospital, Rachel is finally trusting the people around her. Elliot initially planned to interrogate her, but Michael stops him, explaining she needs her rest.

title: Episode #3.13
description: Rodney brings a visit to the girl with Allison's bracelet, but she reacts violently when he tries to talk to her. Hannah begs Betty for forgiveness for treating her badly. For a moment, Betty sympathizes for her, until she finds out Hannah is only using her to not be forced to testify in court. Back in the hospital, Elliot tries to convince Dr. Rossi to let Connie talk to the wild girl. Later, the girl reveals herself as Rachel, just like in the bible. She doesn't remember where she was born, but she does say that she is either 18 or 19 years old. He tries to make her explain how she got Allison's bracelet, and she responds she found it somewhere.

title: Episode #3.14
description: Rodney fears the trial could have impact on Peyton's health and decides to spend some time with him. Betty wants Steven not to include Hannah as a witness of Ann's death, but he refuses to take her advice. Sandy blames Chris for having lied in court to get back at his brother. Dr. Rossi tells Rachel she is almost recovered from the fall in the cabin and will be turned into the authorities unless she tells him who she is. As he sympathizes for her faith, he offers her a job at the hospital, which she reluctantly accepts, as she realizes it is the only way to have her freedom assured. They are interrupted with a visit from Rodney, who tells Dr. Rossi he fears that Hannah will kill Peyton.

title: Episode #3.15
description: Rachel starts working as a nurse. Her mental problems make Dr. Rossi think she isn't co-operative and when he threatens to send her into the hands of the juvenile authorities, she again reacts violently. Meanwhile, Lee feels hurt by Chris' testimony, which in his opinion, is one big lie. Rodney tries to stop Fowler from including Peyton in the trial. Rachel has locked herself into the room, but Rita is able to win her trust.

title: Episode #3.16
description: Dr. Rossi receives a visit from Mrs. Burroughs, a woman who lived on a farm near Rachel. She explains that her parents died and that her aunt Lucy Chandler, whom she was living with, died a week ago. She warns him not to send her back to Lucy's husband Jack, claiming that he is not fit to take care of her, because he is godless. Meanwhile, Connie is testified in court, where she tries to explain how dangerous Lee was. Rachel is searching for Rita and stumbles upon Rodney, who bothers her with wanting information about Allison.

title: Episode #3.17
description: Rachel starts to worry when she realizes the police are searching for her. The next morning, Eli notices that she spent the night on a park bench and they get acquainted. She confides in him that her uncle treated her horribly, even poisoning her dog. Meanwhile, Steven tells Betty he wants to sell their apartment, explaining he can't live in a place his mother paid for. Dr. Rossi warns Betty that people with the same career drive as Steven usually suffer from heart attacks at age 40. Rachel meets up with Rita and tells her that she would rather die than go back to Jack Chandler. Eli overhears their conversation and promises her to find out how old she is. He tells her that if she is 21 years old, they can't make her go back to Jack. She trusts him, until she finds out he is Elliot's father.

title: Episode #3.18
description: Rodney again forces Rachel to tell everything she knows about Allison. When she denies knowing anything, he takes her to the police station. There, she is forced to go to prison until her uncle arrives. When Rita finds out about that, she is determined to protect her. Meanwhile, Sandy tries to make Betty jealous by telling about her relationship with Rodney. The hatred between Martin and Hannah grows when he puts back Catherine's painting to the wall. Eli feels that everyone is treating Rachel as if she were a witch in Salem. Connie receives a prank call from a girl pretending to be Allison.

title: Episode #3.19
description: Norman and Rita offer Rachel to live with them, but Michael tells they can't take her in because they are only 19 years old. Elliot feels that Leslie is trying to convince him to hate Peyton. Rachel feels that she is being punished for having left the hospital. She promises Michael she will work hard if she can stay at the hospital, but he responds that the hospital is for sick people only. As a reaction, she stabs herself in the hand. Meanwhile, Steven fears that Peyton's testimony could ruin his career. Rodney feels guilty about having sent Rachel to the police.

title: Episode #3.20
description: While having her wounds stitched in the hospital, Rachel tells Dr. Rossi about the abuse in her past. She tells him that Jack beat her up regularly with a belt, but that she refused to cry. She says that she always went to the cabin in the woods when she wanted to be away from her uncle. When Michael hears that Jack even went as far as sexual abuse, he promises her that she won't have to go back to him. He contacts Steven to help him prohibit Rachel from having to return to Jack, but he is too drunk to help. He later takes all his anger towards Peyton out on Betty.

title: Episode #3.21
description: Norman wants to attend Peyton's testimony, but feels that he shouldn't. Peyton speaks about the conversation between Ann and Hannah, shortly before she died. He tells that Ann was emotionally exhausted when she left. When Steven tries to examine him, Peyton suffers a minor heart attack and trial has to be postponed. Steven suspects that he is faking it. Dr. Rossi announces that he is perfectly able to go back to stand, but Peyton is making up excuses not to. Jack Chandler arrives in Peyton Place to get Rachel Welles.

title: Episode #3.22
description: Jack tries to visit Rachel, but he isn't allowed to see her. Judge Chester thinks Steven's interrogation with Peyton is going too far and suggests him to withdraw from the case if he continues to act unprofessional. Nevertheless, Steven is able to prove that Peyton was in no way capable to draw a conclusion from Hannah and Ann's conversation. Peyton claims that their conversation is of minor importance, but Steven tries to prove that Peyton and Hannah pushed Ann over the edge. Steven's continuing unprofessional behavior leads him to having to pay a fine of 500 dollars. Meanwhile, Jack finds a way to Rachel, which upsets her very much. Dr. Rossi sends him away and threatens to call the police if he returns.

title: Episode #3.23
description: Dr. Rossi promises Rachel that Jack won't return. Leslie expresses his disappointment in Steven, but Betty responds by blaming him for being too afraid to confront Peyton himself. Hannah is excited to receive a phone call from Steven, inviting her over. Peyton thinks Steven has given up on trial. When Hannah drops by, she is enthusiastic, until she finds out that he only invited her over to give up his apartment. Meanwhile, Michael wants Fowler to help him get a restraining order against Jack. Jack comes in next and claims that Michael is only keeping Rachel in the hospital for personal reasons. He swears that he never mistreated her and always provided her a roof over her head and food. He claims that Rachel was the bad person, acting like a wild girl, even kicked out of school. He agrees not to visit her, though, but insists on winning her custody in court.

title: Episode #3.24
description: Rachel refuses to receive Constance's visit, but Michael convinces her to do otherwise. Chris confronts Sandy with her connection to Rodney. Hannah is seen entering Ann's apartment. Lee blames Steven for ruining his chances on winning the case and tells him that he can't bear jail any longer. Rodney and Norman try to greet Hannah, but she doesn't seem to notice them. Rachel tells Connie that she never saw Allison and blames her for Allison running away in the first place.

title: Episode #3.25
description: Connie takes Matthew outside for the first time. Steven tells Betty that he will try to prove that Hannah pushed Ann over the edge, killing herself. Rachel is forced to talk to Jack. He tries to convince her to come with him, because she isn't capable of taking care of herself. He tells her that he doesn't believe that she doesn't remember where she found Allison's bracelet and forces her to tell the truth. When he threatens her, she responds that she will claim that she found it in his car if he doesn't leave her alone.

title: Episode #3.26
description: Jack threatens to get Rachel and Michael if she blackmails him. Steven interrogates Hannah. He points out her bitterness against Ann. After an emotional interrogation, she admits that she had a second meeting with Ann at the bluff, shortly before she died. Meanwhile, Elliot recalls having seen Jack before. He questions Rachel about it, but she doesn't want to talk about him.

title: Episode #3.27
description: Rachel apologizes to Connie for her behavior. Elliot recently has found out that Jack has a mysterious past, because he can't find any information about it. Meanwhile, Hannah claims that she saw Lee pushing Ann off the cliff. He attacks her for not reporting it and tries to prove that she is lying. Peyton stands up for her, which causes a commotion in court. Shortly after, Hannah reveals that she is neither Ann nor Steven's biological mother. She shocks everyone by revealing that Catherine was his and Ann's real mother. She further tells that Catherine had an affair with her husband and that Martin paid Brian Corby to keep silent. Steven proceeds interrogating her and she answers his questions by saying that she told the entire truth to Ann shortly before her death and begged her for forgiveness. Hannah explains that Peyton tried to hide the scandal by assigning her as the twin's mother.

title: Episode #3.28
description: Peyton feels that he has failed as a father. He tells Michael that he doesn't believe that Ann could ever have committed suicide and promises him that he will make Lee pay for what he has done. Meanwhile, Leslie admits to Rodney that he was almost never close to Catherine. Later at the mansion, Leslie gives Hannah a hard time, claiming that she was the one who pushed Ann off the cliff. Michael doesn't believe Rachel when she tells him nothing went on during her conversation with Jack. Elliot is trying to find out if Jack Chandler has ever been in prison.

title: Episode #3.29
description: Jack assures Elliot that Rachel is telling the truth about how she found the bracelet, explaining that she never lies. Leslie confronts Peyton with the truth finally revealed, to which he responds that Leslie has never belonged in the Peyton mansion. Norman is furious about Hannah's revealing, realizing that his mother was as crazy as everyone else thinks. Rita tries to comfort him, but he doesn't let her, saying that he will never have children.

title: Episode #3.30
description: Rodney is mad at Martin Peyton for hiding a huge secret for all those years, but he rationalizes it by explaining that he did it to protect Catherine. Rodney admits that he doesn't remorse not having loved his mother. Meanwhile, Betty is worried about Steven, who has been missing since Hannah's testimony. Michael tells to Rachel that Jack won't force her to go back to the farm, but that she will have to go to a foster home because she is a minor. Steven returns and claims to Betty that he isn't mad about the truth.

title: Episode #3.32
description: Lee tries to stop Sandy from leaving him. Rachel tries to learn more about Michael's relationship with Ann, but he doesn't like to talk about it. Steven makes clear to Rodney that knowing that they are brothers will not change anything between them. Michael tells Rachel he can't keep an eye on Rachel all the time and asks her to take her in. Connie agrees and immediately bonds with her. Rachel later flirts with Rodney, which makes him feel uncomfortable.

title: Episode #3.33
description: Jack orders Rachel to not ever tell everyone about his connection to Allison. Hannah packs to leave town and tells Martin Peyton that she doesn't have a definite destination to go to. Elliot is against Rachel moving in with them, feeling that Connie sees as her as a replacement for Allison. Hannah assures to Betty that Steven's obsession with Peyton is greater than his love for her and advices her to always stand by Steven no matter what. Peyton tells Norman that he has to accept that his mother was a morally corrupt woman. Lee warns Rodney not to see Sandy anymore.

title: Episode #3.34
description: Hannah comes to Steven to say goodbye to him, but he takes this opportunity to find out if she were lying about having seen Lee killing Ann. Before leaving, she assures him that she wasn't lying and he admits that he wants to love her, but can't. Meanwhile, Rachel starts studying to one day work at the hospital. Peyton gives Mary and Thomas the night off to be alone at the mansion. Rita wants Peyton's help to assure Norman that he won't turn into his mother, but he responds that he can't help. Michael packs to go on vacation, visiting old friends. Elliot finally agrees to take in Rachel. Hannah sets Catherine's painting on fire.

title: Episode #3.35
description: Norman notices that Rachel is a very quick learner. Steven and Betty arrive at the Peyton mansion, noticing that it is on fire. Steven doesn't hesitate and goes in, saving Petyon's life. When Rachel hears the sirens, she gets extremely scared, confiding in Rodney that is because her parents died at a fire. In the hospital, it is revealed that Peyton is in critical condition. Betty confronts Steven with his obsession with Peyton.

title: Episode #3.36
description: While still in critical shape, Peyton offers Steven something in return for saving his life. Rachel is reluctant to move into the Carson home, because she knows that Elliot isn't fond of her. Elliot steel feels bad about Sandy's short lived affair with Rodney. Rodney tells Rachel that she is acting as a spoiled brat, because she is mad at Michael for going on vacation. Rachel tells him that she refuses to live with the Carsons, thinking that it is a charity act, but Rodney forces her to do otherwise. At the Peyton mansion, Steven announces that he wants to move in.

title: Episode #3.37
description: Rachel moves into the Carson home and adjusts to being Matthew's babysitter. Lee promises Sandy that he will make her want him back. She turns to Rodney, but he asks her to stay away from him. Lee tries to visit Martin Peyton, but is stopped by Steven, who tells him that he hates him.

title: Episode #3.38
description: The tension between Chris and Lee grows. Leslie tells Rodney that Steven having saved Martin could work against him and advices him to do anything to stop Steven from gaining power. Martin offers Betty to decorate the mansion, which is in repair. Rita thinks of arranging a date between Rod and Rachel. Chris secretly steals Ada's gun.

title: Episode #3.39
description: Chris is intending to use the gun to kill Lee. Lee announces he got a job at a fisher's boat. Before Chris is able to shoot them, Sandy comes in, which stops Chris. Meanwhile, Steven announces to Peyton that he will move in with him. The chemistry between Rod and Rachel grows while having dinner at Rita's. Lee and Norman get into a fight at Ada's tavern. Later outside, Chris again attempts to shoot Lee, but he is interrupted by Norman.

title: Episode #3.40
description: Norman misinterprets that Lee was going to attack Chris and takes Chris to his house. Rodney takes Rachel home and is spotted by Jack. Connie admits that she has accepted that Allison has left town. Rodney announces that he is moving out of the Peyton mansion.

title: Episode #3.41
description: Rita advices Norman not to interfere with Chris and Lee. Rodney doesn't understand why Steven and Betty want to live with Martin Peyton. Ada finds out that her gun is missing. Peyton questions Steven if he should sue Hannah, but he responds that he doesn't care.

title: Episode #3.42
description: Steven thinks Lee has stolen Ada's gun, unaware that Chris did it. Jack tries to convince Rachel that Elliot and Connie only took her in the house to get more information about Allison. He later announces that he is moving to Peyton Place, and claims that he only has the best intentions for Rachel.

title: Episode #3.43
description: When Rodney announces that he is moving into a garage, Lee gives him a hard time, even vandalizing his place. Lee later attacks Chris, because he tried to stop him when he was harassing Sandy. Meanwhile, Rachel is receiving scary phone calls from Jack. When she admits this to Rodney, he kisses her, shortly before visiting Jack. When he demands him to leave Rachel alone, he doesn't take him seriously.

title: Episode #3.44
description: Sandy realizes that she can't be with her husband any longer and tries to convince Chris to leave town with her. He promises he will leave with her, but insists on stopping at home alone first. Meanwhile, Peyton admits to Betty that he wouldn't have allowed Steven to move into his mansion if it weren't for her. Chris can't find Ada's gun anywhere, unaware that Lee has found and taken it, but still sets a trap. Ada tells Steven that she is certain that Chris took her gun. Lee phones Steven and lies that Chris is threatening to kill himself.

title: Episode #3.45
description: Chris, thinking it is Lee coming in the house, attempts to shoot Steven. When the police arrives, Steven lies that the gun went off by accidence. Meanwhile, Connie wants Michael to return to Peyton Place. Norman is annoyed by Rita's attempts to force him to study and admits that he doesn't know what he wants with his future. Chris tells Steven that he isn't sorry for attempting to kill Lee. He is about to leave Peyton Place and invites Sandy, but she refuses, explaining that she isn't afraid of Lee anymore. Steven assures Lee that he will make him pay for killing Ann. Sandy checks into the Inn and is comforted by Rodney.

title: Episode #3.46
description: Mike returns from vacation. Sandy files for divorce. Steven and Betty move into the Peyton mansion and deal with Leslie's confrontation against Peyton. Mike admits that he doesn't ever intend on leaving Peyton Place. Rodney and Rachel are out on a date. Mike has bought Rachel a dog. Rodney confronts Michael with being jealous about Rachel's affection to him.

title: Episode #3.47
description: Jack advices Rodney not to hurry his relationship with Rachel. When Rita collapses in front of Norman, she admits that she has had these attacks several times. Steven assures Betty that he feels comfortable in the Peyton mansion. Leslie identifies Jack as Jack Forrest, an old acquaintance who has information about Elizabeth Carson. Jack blackmails him for a job. Meanwhile, Sandy moves in Ada's place. Lee forces himself into her house and assures Sandy that he will change her mind about the divorce. Michael tries to make clear to Rachel that they can never become more than friends.

title: Episode #3.48
description: Rita feels upset over Michael's outburst. Rita is diagnosed with rheumatic fever, but Dr. Rossi suspects she might have a more serious disease: mitral stenosis. Peyton hires Betty as Hannah's replacement. Jack tells Ada about Eddie, her husband who walked out on her. Elliot admits to Eli that he doesn't trust Rachel. Sandy tells Rodney that she is staying in Peyton Place for him. Rodney pushes her away, assuring her that he isn't ready to commit himself. Sandy, however, isn't scared by that, but promises not to bother him anymore.

title: Episode #3.49
description: Rachel thinks her relationship with Rodney is going too fast, but he thinks he isn't able to slow down. Peyton announces that Thomas will be replace and wants a portrait of Betty to hang in the mansion. Elliot finds out that Rachel is lying about talking to Chandler. Rodney stops by Sandy and kisses her.

title: Episode #3.50
description: Norman wonders why Ada never told him she knows Chandler. Lee notices an advertisement in the paper to be Peyton's chauffeur. Rachel admits to Rita that she found Allison's bracelet in Chandler's car and plans on leaving Peyton Place for holding the information from the Carsons. Sandy promises Rodney that there won't be any strings on their relationship. Connie is mad at Elliot for scaring Rachel away.

title: Episode #3.51
description: Rachel moves into Norman and Rita's apartment and is determined to find out what happened to Allison. Leslie tries to dig into Jack Chandler's past. Steven thinks Peyton is using Betty. Lee applies for a job as Peyton's chauffeur.

title: Episode #3.52
description: Lee is hired as Peyton's chauffeur. Connie is mad at Elliot for scaring away Rachel. Norman isn't pleased with having over Rachel. Peyton tells Steven he hired Lee as his chauffeur to make him pay for killing Ann. Eli confronts Elliot with his compassionless behavior against Rachel.

title: Episode #3.53
description: Steven feels Betty is defending Peyton too much. Rachel tells Rita she is determined to find out if Jack killed Allison. Norman has asked for a study finance loan, but he isn't qualified to receive money because he is wealthy Leslie's son. Rachel leaves Peyton Place for Hastings Valley. Chandler notices her and follows her to the old home where they once lived. She goes in and finds a belt with the initials "JF", when she is suddenly startled by Chandler.

title: Episode #3.54
description: Rachel tries to run away from Chandler, but he refuses to let her go. She struggles and finally hit him in the head with a candle stick and is driven back to Peyton Place by Mr. Burrows. Meanwhile, Elliot has come to the farmhouse as well to look for Rachel. Rachel announces to Michael that she will leave Peyton Place and lies about her motives. Rodney takes Sandy out on a date.

title: Episode #3.55
description: Elliot invites Rachel back home. She initially refuses to, but accepts his offer when he apologizes. He later asks Leslie for Chandler's personnel file. Rita tries to convince Rachel to tell Elliot about having run into Chandler at the farmhouse.

title: Episode #3.56
description: Rachel realizes Chandler is still alive, when he walks by the bookstore in Peyton Place. Steven isn't glad with Lee serving as Peyton's chauffeur. Leslie tries to fire Chandler, but Chandler blackmails him with an illegal deal they made twenty years ago.

title: Episode #3.57
description: Peyton meets with his Boston attorney Kennerly to change his will. Lee is upset to see Rodney and Sandy out on a date. Norman refuses a loan from Leslie. Chandler claims that he loves Rachel and that he misunderstood about his intentions.

title: Episode #3.58
description: Chandler steals Rachel's puppy. Elliot thinks Chandler has an obsession for Rachel. Rodney feels that Peyton is trying to point out that Steven is now, in his eyes, the better grandson. Lee harasses Sandy for dating Rodney, but Rodney saves her by knocking down Lee. Even though their date didn't go as planned, Rodney and Sandy kiss each other at the end of the night.

title: Episode #3.59
description: Lee finds Rachel's puppy, who has been dumped in Peyton's limousine by Chandler. Leslie wants to teach Rodney how to run business. Even though Rita is ordered by the doctor to take it easy, she agrees to babysit Matthew. Elliot convinces Eli to help him find out more on Chandler's past. Leslie finds out Kennerly has made a brief visit to Peyton. Upon returning the puppy to Rachel, he tries to make Rodney jealous by asking her out. When she refuses, he forces himself up to her. She is able to run away when Betty suddenly walks in.

title: Episode #3.60
description: Betty warns Rachel about Lee. When Lee blackmails Chandler into arranging him a date with Rachel, Chandler demands him to stay away from her. Elliot finds the buckle with the initials "JF" and when questioned about it, Rachel lies about finding it. Leslie thinks Peyton has disinherited his sons.

title: Episode #3.61
description: Rachel asks Chandler for an explanation for his cruel behavior. He tries to apologize, but she feels that he doesn't trust her and leaves. Meanwhile, Norman thinks Rachel is playing a game with the whole town and doesn't want Rita to hang out with her. Michael helps Rachel enroll in school and admits that he would like to know her real age, so they could possibly be in a relationship. Lee asks Elliot for permission to ask out Rachel, but he tells him he isn't good enough for her. Leslie blackmails Betty into breaking into Peyton's save to find out if he changed his will, threatening to reveal her New York party girl image if she won't.

title: Episode #3.62
description: Even though the report on her New York days are false, Betty considers doing as Leslie urged her to. She isn't able to go forward with it and considers telling Steven the truth, but she doesn't have the courage. Meanwhile, Rita fears she is going to die, but Dr. Rossi tries to reassure her that she can be cured if she takes a lot of rest.

title: Episode #3.63
description: Betty tells Peyton about her doubts concerning if she is suited for a high class life. Eli finds out an unknown person has been living with Chandler at his farmhouse. Steven finds out Betty has been meeting Leslie. Connie confronts Elliot with trying to justify everything he does wrong by mentioning Allison. Betty steels the will and is caught by Lee.

title: Episode #3.64
description: Betty reads in Peyton's will that his entire estate will go to her after his death, but only if she marries Rodney. When Leslie finds out about this, he tries to convince Betty to marry Rod. Meanwhile, Elliot searches Rachel's room for the buckle belt she found. Sandy is jealous of Rodney's interest in Rachel. Chandler persuades Rachel to move with him to Mexico. She pretends to be interested to find out more about him.

title: Episode #3.65
description: Lee tells Steven that Betty has stolen Peyton's will. When warned by Rita, Michael barges himself into Chandler's apartment and is shocked to see that Rachel is seemingly enjoying staying at his place. Meanwhile, Rita collapses in Rodney's garage. Elliot finds out Rachel's buckle belt was made in a Texas prison in 1956, where a man named Jack Forrest was spending time for criminal assault. Michael brings home Rachel and is questioned by Connie if he wants to be in a relationship with Rachel.

title: Episode #3.66
description: Steven questions Betty about her whereabouts around the time she stole the will and she lies about it. Rita is in the hospital getting an EKG. It is revealed that Lee told Steven about his wife's actions in order of Peyton, who knew about the theft. Ada tries to prevent Elliot from doing something to Chandler he will regret.

title: Episode #3.67
description: Rachel admits to Elliot that she found Allison's bracelet in Chandler's car and that she lied about everything out of fear of Chandler. Dr. Rossi tells Norman that he can't make love with Rita anymore because of her condition. Chandler blackmails Leslie into giving him money so he can leave town. Peyton reveals to Betty that he knows she has his will. He isn't mad, but makes clear that he agrees with Leslie about her marrying Rodney. Meanwhile, Elliot finds Chandler at the wharf and they get into a physical fight.

title: Episode #3.68
description: Elliot hits Chandler unconscious. Later, Chandler charges him with assault. Betty announces to Peyton that she will battle him to change back his will. Steven tells Elliot that if proven guilty, Elliot could be sent to jail for 1 to 12 years.

title: Episode #3.69
description: Rachel feels that it is her fault if Elliot goes to prison. Elliot tells Eli he doesn't regret beating up Chandler. Lee tries to convince Sandy to go back to him and kisses her. Rachel visits Chandler in the hospital and suggests him to leave the country. He threatens to destroy the Carsons.

title: Episode #3.70
description: Rachel tells Connie that Chandler will eventually destroy everyone and that he must be stopped. Chandler threatens to talk about Dr. Rossi and Rachel's so-called relationship if he works against him. Ada confirms to Leslie that Chandler's real name is Jack Forrest. Rodney asks Peyton for financial support for Norman, so he can pay Rita's medical care.

title: Episode #3.71
description: Rodney feels Betty is becoming Peyton's pet. Chandler reminds Leslie that he hired him 20 years ago to kill his wife. Michael suggests Elliot to send Rachel to a boarding school. Peyton asks Leslie to help him break up Steven and Betty's marriage and convince Betty to remarry Rod.

title: Episode #3.72
description: Norman refuses Rodney's money. Chandler has backed off from the charges, but Elliot wants to press the case. Leslie pretends not to know anything about Chandler. Michael suggests Rachel to leave town for a while, which makes her think she is unwanted. Lee encourages Chandler to beat up Michael.

title: Episode #3.73
description: Steven receives a confidential letter and immediately leaves for New York. During an argue, Rachel tells Michael she loves him and they kiss after wards. Eli warns Elliot that Chandler is about to leave town. Steven was supposed to file a warrant against Chandler, but much to Elliot's anger, he hasn't.

title: Episode #3.74
description: Michael tells Rachel they can never have a relationship. Rachel is mad at Michael for him treating her as if she was any other girl. Elliot is upset that Chandler has been released from prison. Martin is throwing a party for Steven's 28th birthday and notices Betty isn't present. As a present to Steven, Betty's painting is revealed.

title: Episode #3.75
description: Steven demands to find out who has written a blame report to him about Betty's theft and turns the letter to the newspaper. This much to Rodney's disgust, who advises Betty to leave Steven. Steven later confronts Betty with her past in New York.

title: Episode #3.76
description: Betty admits to having stolen Peyton's will and explains Steven that she has to divorce him and marry Rodney if she wants to inherit Peyton's money. Later, Steven tries to prevent Elliot from printing the blame report. Meanwhile, Rita confronts Mike with having kissed Rachel. Rodney finds out about Peyton's will conditions.

title: Episode #3.77
description: Rodney is furious at Peyton and tries to avoid him. Elliot and Connie arrange a police offer to protect Rachel from Chandler. Rodney admits to Rachel he wishes Michael would stay away from her. Betty attempts to reconcile with Steven. Steven announces that he is planning on destroying Peyton by trying to prove he is incompetent.

title: Episode #3.78
description: Steven claims Peyton announced he wants to move Catherine's grave. Lee lies to the police about not knowing where Chandler is. Despite her claim she is in love with him, Rodney breaks off his relationship with Sandy. Lee suggests Chandler to flee town.

title: Episode #3.79
description: Peyton offers Sandy $2,000 to leave town the same night, but she angrily rejects his offer. Rodney confronts Michael with his over-protectiveness of Rachel. Steven wants to include Norman in his plan to destroy Peyton. Sandy announces she is leaving town for California and reveals to Steven and Betty it is because of Peyton. Outside Peyton High, Chandler kidnaps Rachel.

title: Episode #3.80
description: Rodney discourages Norman from siding with Steven. Lee blames Peyton for scaring Sandy away. Rachel unsuccessfully attempts to run away from Chandler. After knocking him in the head, Rachel is taken captive at her old farm.

title: Episode #3.81
description: Chandler claims that Rachel set the house on fire, killing her parents, but Rachel insists it was an accident. He furthermore reveals that Allison told him she saw Rachel killing her aunt Lucy. Rachel admits to having hated Lucy, but again insists it was an accident. Meanwhile, Peyton confronts Betty with having tried to manipulate him about his daughter's grave. Rachel pretends to willingly go with Chandler and then escapes to return home. Lee denies having taken in Chandler. Back home, Rachel gives a false statement about how she escaped from Chandler.

title: Episode #3.82
description: Aware that Chandler is still on the loose, the Carson house remains restless. Rachel considers telling Connie about her information on Allison, but is too afraid. Meanwhile, Betty thinks Peyton is buying her expensive jewelry and reject it, but Peyton tells her it's for someone else.

title: Episode #3.83
description: Chandler attempts to check into a motel, but is recognized by the manager and reported to the police. Elliot and Connie find out Rachel gave them a false statement. Rodney orders Steven to let him and Norman alone concerning Peyton's will. Leslie tries to keep the Chandler case out of the press. Connie confronts Rachel with withholding information about Chandler.

title: Episode #3.84
description: Because the Carsons have lost their trust in Rachel, Michael is being contacted to talk to her, but he isn't able to get through her. When Peyton announces he is leaving for Boston, Steven decides to follow him. Rachel, distressed by being denounced, takes Matthew and runs away.

title: Episode #3.85
description: Elliot thinks Chandler and Rachel both kidnapped Matthew. Betty cheats on her husband by kissing Rodney. Steven reveals he has seen Peyton secretly meeting a young woman. Rachel calls the Carson home and lies about being abducted.

title: Episode #3.86
description: Rachel leaves Matthew at the hospital, leaving a letter in which she lies that Chandler, while holding her captive, allowed her to drop off Matthew. Chandler is arrested by the police. Elliot thinks Rachel is fully responsible for Matthew's disappearance. Eli thinks that Rachel took Matthew only to return him and receive gratitude.

title: Episode #3.87
description: Rachel has lost her mind and thinks she is Allison. Michael explains she is doing this because she knows Rachel isn't worthy of the Carsons' love, unlike Allison. It is revealed that Rachel accidentally killed her aunt and kept her interference with Allison, who witnessed this, a secret because she knew she had to admit to the killing if she revealed she saw Allison. Michael decides to send her to a clinic in Boston and shortly before leaving, she bids farewell to Connie, whom she calls her mother, and Elliot, whom she finally gives Allison's bracelet.

title: Episode #3.88
description: Steven asks Dr. Rossi to become Peyton's doctor again, but he is too upset by Rachel's leaving. Chandler tries to blackmail Leslie into bailing him out. Norman asks Connie to let Rita become Matthew's new babysitter, but Connie, not trusting anyone anymore, rejects it. Leslie refuses to give Norman a job through Rod. Peyton's guest, the sophisticated Adrienne Van Leyden, arrives in town.

title: Episode #3.89
description: Steven and Betty don't trust the arrival of widowed Adrienne Van Leyden. Chandler wants Steven as his lawyer. Rita has breathing problems and is taken to the hospital. It turns out she is pregnant, but due to her weakened heart, the possibility of a miscarriage is very big. Disturbed, Norman goes to a park bench, where he notices his father giving a gun through the cell bars to Chandler.

title: Episode #3.90
description: Chandler uses a gun to escape from jail. Unlike Norman, Rita is delighted to find out she is pregnant. Adrienne tells Martin she thinks Steven is too hostile for their plan. Norman blackmails Leslie into giving him a job. Steven tries to find out why Adrienne has come to Peyton Place.

title: Episode #3.91
description: Betty admits she feels threatened by Adrienne's presence, but Steven assures her he has no special interest in the woman. Connie apologizes for her outburst to Norman. Mike is startled when he finds out Adrienne has arrived in town, claiming she destroyed her late husband.

title: Episode #3.92
description: Adrienne slaps Michael and claims he is only bitter because Dr. Van Leyden left him. Elliot tries to force Lee into telling him about Chandler. Adrienne announces to Steven she wants to sue Michael for slander, but he discourages her to. In a conversation with Peyton, Lee links Chandler's escape to Leslie.

title: Episode #3.93
description: Ada suspects Rita isn't happy. Peyton questions Leslie about why he hired Chandler and threatens to disinherit him. Elliot tries to find out who slipped Chandler the gun, but Ada orders him to quit his man-hunts. Betty questions Steven if he feels attracted to Adrienne, but he calls her a useless person.

title: Episode #3.94
description: The gun which Chandler used to escape arrives at the Clarion by mail. Rod suggests Norman to move, but Rita refuses to. When Leslie finds out he is a suspect for having given Chandler the gun, he calls for Stan Howard. Adrienne announces she wants to withdraw from Peyton's plan, but Peyton blackmails her into staying, announcing she is in Peyton Place to destroy Steven and Betty's marriage.

title: Episode #3.95
description: Betty is angry at Steven for his meetings with Adrienne, but when she sees her standing, Betty kisses Steven to make Adrienne jealous. Later, Lee starts flirting with Adrienne, and Steven reacts over-protectedly. Betty blames Peyton for trying to break up her marriage.

title: Episode #3.96
description: Norman admits to Rodney that Leslie helped Chandler escape. Peyton and Adrienne set out to Boston to include Adrienne in his will. Ada's estranged husband Eddie Jacks returns to Peyton Place and insists on meeting Rita, much to Ada's distress.

title: Episode #3.97
description: Steven announces he has subpoenaed Peyton's will. Peyton announces he is engaged to Adrienne. Adrienne later questions him about this scheme. Betty confronts Steven with his attraction to Adrienne and his jealousy about her engagement. Rodney threatens to go to the police with his information about Leslie, until he finds out Chandler has been shot down by the police in Georgia.

title: Episode #3.98
description: Eddie announces he has come to town to get in touch with Rita. Adrienne tries to make Betty jealous by saying that she noticed Steven's attraction to her. Elliot realizes Chandler's death end his hope of ever finding out what happened to Allison. Betty announces she wants to leave Peyton Place.

title: Episode #3.99
description: Eddie gets a job at the Clarion and reveals to Elliot that he has been in prison for five years. Leslie tries to convince Ada to drive Eddie out of town. Adrienne sets out to the beach to seduce Steven. They are seen kissing by Rita.

title: Episode #3.100
description: Rita is shocked and enraged to meet her father. She later admits to Rodney she saw Steven kissing another woman. Lee tells Peyton he saw the same, but promises to keep silent. Rita is mad at Ada for having lied about her regarding her father's presence in town.

title: Episode #3.101
description: Steven assures Adrienne they will never have an affair, but they end up kissing again. Rita is still quarreling with her mother. Peyton confronts Adrienne with falling in love with Steven and threatens to expose her if she runs off with him. Elliot wants Connie to hire Eddie. Lee reveals to Betty that Steven and Adrienne kissed.

title: Episode #4.1
description: Eddie tells Leslie about Adrienne's past as entertaining men and announces he wants to be his business partner. Leslie thinks Adrienne will inherit all of Peyton's money. Betty admits to Rodney she fears losing Steven to Adrienne.

title: Episode #4.2
description: Rod confronts Steven with having kissed Adrienne, but he denies the whole thing. Rod later advises Betty to leave Steven. Meanwhile, Rita decides she wants to meet her father again, but Eddie ends up trying to set her against her mother. Steven still acts cold against Adrienne, and orders her to stay away from him, aware that he can't stop kissing her.

title: Episode #4.3
description: Norman demands Eddie to leave Rita alone. Michael reveals that shortly before Philip allegedly committed suicide, he told a doctor he was full with life. Peyton attempts to encourage Betty of being suspicious of her husband's loyalty. Eddie offers to leave town, but manipulates Rita into making him stay.

title: Episode #4.4
description: Steven secretly meets Adrienne in Boston. Rodney refuses to interfere with Betty's life. Peyton accuses Lee of having told Rodney about Steven's affair. Ada tries to convince Elliot to drive Eddie out of town. Betty has followed Steven to Boston and spots him with Adrienne.

title: Episode #4.5
description: To reconcile with her daughter, Ada reluctantly hires Eddie as a bartender. Adrienne tells Peyton she was aware that she was being watched in Boston by Betty. Eddie confirms that Leslie and Chandler have met in the past, but refuses to answer any of Elliot's further questions.

title: Episode #4.6
description: Rodney tries to discourage Betty from suspecting her husband of cheating. Adrienne is disgusted that Peyton wants to stick to their original plan, despite risking a scandal. Betty confronts her husband with his adultery. He initially denies the accusation, but eventually admits to everything.

title: Episode #4.7
description: Betty walks out on her marriage and leaves the Peyton mansion. Eddie wonders why Elliot is suddenly suspicious of him. Forced by Steven, Adrienne comes to tell Betty nothing has happened between Steven and her, but soon admits to the truth.

title: Episode #4.8
description: Betty refuses to speak Steven and announces to Peyton that there will be no reconciliation. She later announces to Rod she is going to see a lawyer regarding her marriage. Meanwhile, Elliot notices a mysterious meeting between Eddie and Leslie.

title: Episode #4.9
description: Elliot thinks there is a connection between Eddie and Chandler. Michael tells Connie he's going to visit Rachel because she's improving. Steven blames Peyton for Adrienne's presence being part of a scheme and claims his affair with Adrienne was a part of ruining her engagement. Rita confronts Ada with her jealous behavior.

title: Episode #4.10
description: Betty returns from Boston. Peyton tells Rita she's always welcome at the Peyton house. Michael thinks Eddie isn't putting his daughter in the first place. Rita thinks Norman thinks badly of Eddie because he still hasn't accepted her past. After failing to seduce him, Adrienne tells Steven she told Betty that they were lovers.

title: Episode #4.11
description: Eddie blames Ada of bad parenting, which she blames on his absence. Leslie wants Eddie to reveal information on Adrienne's wild past, so Peyton will break off the engagement. Adrienne schemes Peyton into promising to marry her as a formality of financial support.

title: Episode #4.12
description: When Steven blames him for being responsible of Betty leaving him, Rodney hits him. The next day, Eddie tells Steven about Adrienne's past. Rodney takes Betty to the woods and kisses her.

title: Episode #4.13
description: Betty is startled by Rod's kiss, unwilling to be involved with him again. She is next visited by Steven, and tells him she doesn't believe him any longer. Rod tells Rita she shouldn't push Norman into returning to college. Peyton thinks Eddie returned to Peyton Place to swindle him. He next advises Betty to change the grounds for divorce from adultery to mental cruelty, explaining it will hurry the process.

title: Episode #4.14
description: Norman blames Eddie for having returned to Peyton Place to profit from his daughter's marriage into a wealthy family and Eddie eventually hits him. Peyton thinks Eddie will turn Norman and Rita against him and offers Norman to pay for Rita's medical bills in order to prevent this from happening. Steven oversees Rodney and Betty driving off.

title: Episode #4.15
description: Steven sues Peyton for incompetency. He forces Betty to attend the hearing. Peyton tells his lawyer Kennerly that Adrienne will never become his wife. At the stand, Adrienne denies having been hired to break up Steven and Betty's marriage. Judge Chester dismisses the case.

title: Episode #4.16
description: Leslie offers Eddie money to leave him alone. Adrienne feels ashamed that her past is now public information and blames Peyton for it. Connie and Elliot return from visiting Rachel. Eddie swindles Leslie into giving him $50,000 and making him his business partner. Leslie orders him to kill Peyton.

title: Episode #4.17
description: Steven is again successfully seduced by Adrienne. Eddie prepares himself for killing Peyton. Norman visits Dr. Rossi about his cracked ribs caused by Eddie. Betty starts to doubt Adrienne's claims on Steven.

title: Episode #4.18
description: Eli tells Rita she has to choose between Norman and Eddie. Adrienne tells Steven she loves him and they kiss. Betty gives in to Rodney and they kiss. Lee reports to Peyton that he sees through Eddie's attempts to turn him against Peyton. Later, Peyton almost falls down the stairs and Steven does nothing to help him.

title: Episode #4.19
description: Steven admits to Adrienne he considered pushing Peyton off the stairs. Lee continues pretending not to know what Eddie is up to. Dr. Rossi tells Peyton his body is deteriorating. Leslie puts pressure on Eddie to kill Peyton.

title: Episode #4.20
description: Steven tells Adrienne it will never work out between them. Peyton threatens to break off the engagement if Adrienne keeps seeing Steven. Norman realizes he wants to have a baby. Eddie tells Leslie he can convince Lee to kill Peyton. Adrienne breaks into Peyton's personal files, but she is caught by Peyton.

title: Episode #4.21
description: Peyton reveals to Adrienne that Dr. Van Leyden killed himself because she made him lose his dignity. The next day, Peyton is almost hit by a motorcycle driver. Lee saves him, but he is fired moments later on insistence of Adrienne. Adrienne wonders why she drove her husband to suicide.

title: Episode #4.22
description: Eddie realizes he must kill Peyton before he marries Adrienne the next day. Adrienne notices everyone disapproves of her marriage to Peyton and she begs Connie to attend the wedding. Betty visits the Peyton mansion to sign a property settlement arranged by Kennerly. Leslie notices Kennerly and fears he has come back to change Peyton's will.

title: Episode #4.23
description: Eddie pretends to be sick to provide himself an alibi on the night he is supposed to kill Peyton. Peyton tells Adrienne he plans on moving to the apartment where Philip killed himself. Adrienne is fed up with Lee's presence. Betty wants Rod to leave her alone.

title: Episode #4.24
description: Rita notices that Eddie has left the apartment at night. Peyton tells Lee he intends on ruining Adrienne. Adrienne tells Betty nothing happened between she and Steven. Following a confrontation, Adrienne attempts to hit Betty but accidentally plunges to death. Outside, Eddie sees Betty running away from the mansion.

title: Episode #4.25
description: Martin and Lee catch Eddie standing over Adrienne's body and suspect him of having killed her. Rita is worried about Eddie and breaks down. While in jail as a suspect for murder, Eddie tells Steven that he saw his wife leaving the mansion. Dr. Rossi fears the condition of Rita's baby.

title: Episode #4.26
description: Rita is hospitalized. Dr. Rossi tells Norman she can't find out about the situation of Eddie. Peyton tells Lee he thinks Eddie came to the mansion to kill Peyton by contract, not Adrienne. Betty admits to Steven she was at the mansion when Adrienne died.

title: Episode #4.27
description: In jail, Eddie admits to Peyton he was ordered by Lelsie to kill him. Betty insists to Elliot that Eddie is innocent. Rita finds out her father is in jail for murder suspicion. Norman threatens Eddie he will get hurt if something happens to Rita or the baby.

title: Episode #4.28
description: Norman asks his father to bail out Eddie. Eddie is arraigned. He lies to Rita he went to the Peyton mansion to talk to Peyton about Rita's condition. Peyton tells Betty he is aware she was in the home when Adrienne died, but recognizes her death as an accident and advises Betty to deny everything when blamed.

title: Episode #4.29
description: Adrienne is buried. Peyton gives Eddie $50,000 for Norman and Rita. He later discusses their mutual hatred with Steven. Leslie threatens to withdraw bail.

title: Episode #4.30
description: Peyton is in possession of the note which proves that Leslie ordered Eddie to kill him. He announces to Leslie he is leaving Peyton Place and lures him to his office by offering him the mill. Rod finds out a dark-haired girl visited Adrienne shortly before her death. Peyton orders Lee to kill Leslie.

title: Episode #4.31
description: Eddie is thrown out of his apartment due to the murder accusation and moves in with Ada. Peyton calls Leslie and warns him Lee is coming over to kill him and attempts to blackmail him into killing Lee. Betty tells Steven about the night of Adrienne's death. Lee attempts to kill Leslie, and Leslie shoots him in defense.

title: Episode #4.32
description: A severely injured Lee leaves the mill. Steven announces he has found out Eddie isn't responsible for Adrienne's death. Lee arrives at the Peyton mansion and threatens to shoot Peyton, but Steven defends Peyton and Lee is eventually accidentally shot to death.

title: Episode #4.33
description: Peyton blames Steven for having shot Lee. Leslie demands Eddie to give him the note proving he order Eddie to kill Peyton. Elliot wonders why Connie is so upset with Adrienne's death.

title: Episode #4.34
description: A lost baby has been found on a bus in Peyton Place. Steven tells Betty she will be investigated, unless she poses as his loving wife. Leslie denies having hired Eddie to kill Peyton. Peyton leaves town due to health reasons and assigns Leslie to run the mill and leaves the mansion to Steven. Jill arrives at the hospital and identifies herself as the lost baby's mother.

title: Episode #4.35
description: Dr. Rossi finds doesn't believe the baby's mother is the young, unwed Jill. She admits she stole the baby from an adoption agency. Steven questions Michael about Peyton's condition. Betty admits she needs Rod. Connie mistakes Jill for Allison.

title: Episode #4.36
description: Mrs. Hewitt refuses to sublet Jill a room because she is an unwed mother. Sandy visits Peyton Place to attend Lee's funeral. Norman assures Rita she can't trust Eddie, but agrees on accepting him. Rod and Betty share a romantic night at a ski lodge.

title: Episode #4.37
description: Dr. Rossi is still reluctant to release the baby to Jill. She later asks Rodney and after-wards Eli for a job. Steven tells Adrienne's official cause of death is an accidental one. Jill tells Connie she ran away home when she found out she was pregnant. Connie is surprised to hear Jill knows something about Allison.

title: Episode #4.38
description: Connie thinks Allison has an illegitimate baby. Jill fears her baby will be taken away from her. Norman tells Eddie he wishes he would go away forever. Steven is upset that Betty is now dating Rodney and he forces himself up to her. Eddie tells Rita he is leaving town.

title: Episode #4.39
description: Following the news of her father, Rita collapses. Dr. Rossi thinks she needs heart surgery. Following Steven's assault, Betty's face is covered with wounds. When Rod finds out, he goes to the mansion to beat up Steven. Jill makes more mysterious mentions about the Carson family.

title: Episode #4.40
description: Rita is diagnosed with pulmonary edema and undergoes open heart surgery. Norman fears losing her and the baby. Ada reconciles with Eddie for Rita's best interest. Connie scolds Jill for her frequent self-comparison with Allison.

title: Episode #4.41
description: Jill tells Steven that Kelly is Allison's baby. She tells him that she met Allison four months ago in Kansas. Meanwhile, Dr. Rossi announces that Rita is fine. Rita's condition suddenly worsens and she is again taken into surgery.

title: Episode #4.42
description: Following the surgery, Rita suffers a miscarriage. Connie doesn't believe Kelly is Allison's baby. Ada catches Eddie running out on the family again. Eddie admits he returned to Peyton Place to con Rita out of her husband's money, but started loving her in the process. Rita tells Norman she doesn't want to get pregnant again.

title: Episode #4.43
description: Rod tries to cheer up Norman. Connie and Elliot interrogate Jill and Dr. Rossi later tells them he is sure Jill is Kelly's mother. Outside Peyton Place, Steven meets a man and offers him a ride to town. It turns out he is Michael's younger brother Joe.

title: Episode #4.44
description: Joe tells Michael he could no longer stand living with his sister and therefore that traveled to Peyton Place. Connie thinks Allison could have been capable of giving up her child to a stranger, but Elliot refuses to believe Jill. Betty criticizes Norman for feeling sorry for himself.

title: Episode #4.45
description: Jill recognizes Joe and nervously visits Steven, urging him to arrange a birth certificate for Kelly. Elliot is mad at Rodney, thinking he might have impregnated Allison once. Ada is mad at Eddie for using his con acts to cheer up Rita. Joe startles Jill and thinks Kelly is their baby.

title: Episode #4.46
description: Rodney denies having known that Allison has a baby. Having received a telegram conforming Kelly is Allison's baby, Connie apologizes to Jill. Rodney, thinking he is the father, demands to have the baby, but Jill has already promised it to the Carsons.

title: Episode #4.47
description: Rodney wants to claim the baby, but Betty doesn't want to have anything to do with it. Eli wonders why Allison trusted Jill. Rod demands a blood test. Joe tells Michael that Kelly is his and Jill's baby.

title: Episode #4.48
description: Joe is upset to find out that Jill gave the baby to the Carsons. Ada suggests Rita to put the miscarriage in the past and move on. Elliot is still reluctant to take in Kelly.

title: Episode #4.49
description: Rodney wants to be a part of Kelly's life. Michael tells Joe that Don is looking for him due to a debt. Jill fears Rodney will sue for custody. Betty tells Rodney she will accept Kelly, but not love her. Joe reminds Rita of Joe Chernak.

title: Episode #4.50
description: Norman suggests Joe not to try to be like his brother. Connie tells Betty she won't allow her and Rod to adopt Kelly if Betty feels so negatively about the baby. Norman and Joe are involved in a car accident.

title: Episode #4.51
description: Norman is helped out of the car wreck by Rev. Tom Winter. A severely injured Joe is rushed to the hospital. Rita suffers from traumas of Joe. Steven hints to Rodney he will have to choose between Betty and Kelly. Joe has personal difficulty being treated by his big brother.

title: Episode #4.52
description: Rodney feels Kelly would be better off with him than with the Carsons. Michael recommends Norman to allow Rev. Winters to help Rita recover. Joe is surprised Jill actually gave up the baby. Tom is informed that his wife is in bad shape.

title: Episode #4.53
description: Eddie tries to find out more on Joe Chernak, but he is advised not to dig into the past. Michael orders Jill to stay away from Kelly. Joe confronts Rita with her fear of him.

title: Episode #4.54
description: Eddie insists on forcing Joe to leave town so Rita can recover. Betty tells Rodney she wants to move to a barn nearby. Rita tells Norman she did not want to talk to Rev. Winter. Joe confronts Michael with Susan's late night visit to him.

title: Episode #4.55
description: Jill fears Kelly will forget her. Tom refuses to admit that Susan is an alcoholic. Susan shows her discontent of her husband's profession, but Tom refuses to be a part of her father's business. Joe forces himself up to Jill.

title: Episode #4.56
description: Joe confesses to Michael he came to town because he fled from a robbery gone wrong. Ada feels Eddie should leave town. Rodney and Jill grow closer as Jill admits Joe beat her up. Tom thinks Rita still feels she isn't good enough for Norman.

title: Episode #4.57
description: As advised by Tom, Rita decides she can face Joe again. Betty announces her divorce is in its final stage. Jill threatens to go to the police if Joe contacts her one more time. Betty asks Rev. Winter if she can marry Rodney in his church.

title: Episode #4.58
description: Norman can't find Rita. Tom tries to prevent Susan from getting drunk. Jill tells the Carsons to keep Joe away from Kelly. Eddie picks a fight with Joe. The town residents start a search for Rita. Joe spots her going into the place where Joe Chernak molested her and follows her.

title: Episode #4.59
description: Following a confrontation between Joe and Rita, Eddie starts a severe fight with Eddie. Rita tells her mother she is no longer afraid of the past. Michael regrets having taken in Joe. Joe tells the Carsons he is Kelly's father.

title: Episode #4.60
description: Michael admits to Elliot he knew about the true parentage of Kelly, after which Elliot breaks off their friendship. Jill admits to Connie she lied about Allison and Kelly. Susan admits to Steven she is lonely. Rev. Winter agrees on marrying Rod and Betty. Susan threatens to use Steven to make her husband jealous.

title: Episode #4.61
description: Michael and Joe fight over the Rita incident. Eddie is still convinced Joe attacked Rita. Connie refuses to give up Kelly. Ada tells Rita that, without notifying them, Eddie has left town.

title: Episode #4.62
description: During Founders Day Festival, Connie is upset to have to give up Kelly. Rita misses her father. Carolyn flirts with Joe. Kelly is reluctantly given to Jill.

title: Episode #4.63
description: The Festival reminds Betty of the past. Carolyn discusses her parents' divorce with Joe. Joe tries to kiss her, but Carolyn pushes him away. Susan continues to use Steven to make her husband jealous. Tom announces he will never leave Susan.

title: Episode #4.64
description: Tom and Susan plan a romantic afternoon. Jill applies as Rev. Winter's assistant. Elliot feels the town has become a prison for Connie and offers her to leave. Betty admits she would've hated Kelly had Rodney taken her in.

title: Episode #4.65
description: Carolyn is mad at her mother for having filed for divorce. Connie and Elliot pack their stuff to leave town. Marsha is given a hard time by her daughter. Steven tells Betty he has processed their divorce.

title: Episode #4.66
description: Betty unsuccessfully begs the Carsons to stay until the wedding. Susan questions the existence of God. Carolyn and Joe continue their constant bickering. The Carsons accept Michael's apology, before leaving town.

title: Episode #4.67
description: Much to the upset of their friends, the Carsons have left town. Leslie finds out the Peyton Mill has been sold and that he thus loses his job. Julie visits Peyton Place to attend Betty's wedding. Joe thinks Rev. Winter has hired Jill because of a physical attraction. Steven finds out Hannah has returned to town.

title: Episode #4.68
description: Hannah, in order of Peyton, advises Steven not to interfere with Betty's love life. Rodney and Betty are married in church. Marsha tells Rev. Winter she will not leave for New York after all. Steven tells Susan he will break up Betty's marriage.

title: Episode #4.69
description: To prove her husband's manhood, Susan offers to take Jill into their home. Now the Mill has been sold, Norman asks Ada for a job at her tavern. When he stops by for a date, Marsha questions Carolyn about her connection to Joe.

title: Episode #4.70
description: Carolyn spends a date with Joe to anger her mother, but she refuses to respond to his romantic encounters. Marsha asks Michael to tell Joe to leave Carolyn alone. Jill moves in with the Winters, as do Rodney and Betty in their new barn.

title: Episode #4.71
description: Norman wants to partner with Rodney to open a large motorcycle shop, but Rod is not enthusiastic. Despite some reluctance of Michael, the Russells move into the Carsons' house. Tom suspects Susan is up to a scheme. Joe assures Marsha he will leave Carolyn alone.

title: Episode #4.72
description: Carolyn feels humiliated by Joe, since he dumped her for being too young. Rod and Norman make plans for their motorcycle shop. Susan notices Jill idolizing Tom and calls her a replacement wife.

title: Episode #4.73
description: Feeling rejected by Carolyn, Joe forces his way back into Jill's life. Michael asks out Marsha, which angers Carolyn. Susan discusses Tom's attraction to Jill. She later catches Joe forcing himself up to Jill and calls her cheap, before telling her she has to move out.

title: Episode #4.74
description: The tension between Joe and Carolyn grows at a rock concert, as Joe hits Dennis, a friend dancing with Carolyn. Susan overhears a warm conversation between Tom and Jill, in which Tom convinces Jill not to leave town. Mike and Marsha start feeling more attracted to each other.

title: Episode #4.75
description: Carolyn feels that her mother has changed since the divorce. Tom comforts Jill, as she admits she would scheme the townspeople all over again if she had to. It becomes noticeable that Tom is attracted to Jill. Steven tells Rodney he thinks his business will fail. A drunk Susan falls out of bed.

title: Episode #4.76
description: Jill attempts to help Susan as she has a drunken rage. Carolyn takes an interest in Jeff. Norman tells Rodney that Steven has offered to help their motorcycle shop survive. Marsha shares her view on her ex-husband with Mike. Tom feels guilty about his feelings for Jill.

title: Episode #4.77
description: Joe asks out Carolyn, but she rejects him. Michael takes out Marsha for dinner and they kiss after-wards. Eli tells Jill he misses her and thinks she is still not alright. Carolyn thinks her mother is only pretending not to love Fred anymore.

title: Episode #4.78
description: Jill alarms Michael about Tom's interest in her. Betty makes clear to Steven she wants him out of her life. A welfare worker visits the Winters and is worried about Tom's attraction to Jill. During a bike ride, Rodney almost falls off his motorcycle.

title: Episode #4.79
